Subject: Thank You!

X-From: Sloan, Glenn </O=ENRON/OU=NA/CN=RECIPIENTS/CN=GSLOAN>
X-To: Skilling, Jeff </O=ENRON/OU=NA/CN=RECIPIENTS/CN=Jskillin>, Lay, Kenneth </O=ENRON/OU=NA/CN=RECIPIENTS/CN=Klay>
X-cc: Davis, Sarah A. </O=ENRON/OU=NA/CN=RECIPIENTS/CN=Sdavis>
X-bcc: 
X-Folder: \JSKILLIN (Non-Privileged)\Inbox
X-Origin: Dasovich-J
X-FileName: JDASOVIC (Non-Privileged).pst

Dear Messer's Skilling and Lay,

I heard a song with the lyrics "how can I say thanks for all the things you=
've done forevelopment
EB 3150 D
713.345.2786

Juan,
As far as the holidays go, I dowork them at all.    That is all!!!
